text:
- Added an extra option to 'failonerr' to each ClearCase task/command.
- Extended the functionality of cccheckout. It can check (notco) to see if
  the desired element is already checked out to the current view. Thus it
  won't attempt to check it out again.
- Added three new ClearCase commands: ccmkattr, ccmkdir, ccmkelem
creator: sean@cm-logic.com
sean@cm-logic.com
text:
Created attachment 10007
Contains all the changes made to implement the enhancement

creator: sean@cm-logic.com
text:
Created attachment 10008
Three new classes added to clearcase package

creator: sean@cm-logic.com
text:
Created attachment 10010
Most up to date changes. Should ignore orig patch text file (10007)

creator: antoine@apache.org
text:
You would like to add "failonerr" to all ClearCase commands, except, for some
reason for CCRmType (did you forget it or is there here a special hack ?).
Why not add the variable and the setter/getter to the base class ClearCase,
rather than have it in each class ?
I will prepare a revised patch, test it.

Antoine

Created attachment 10035
replaces previous patch file
creator: antoine@apache.org

text:
Hi Sean,

I have reworked your patches, including the correction of the style (spaces).
Also in ant the practice is to use getProject().log(String message, int
msgLevel) rather than System.out.println()
Ooops, I will need to attach another patch file, I have just seen that I had
some System.out left.
Cheers,
Antoine
creator: antoine@apache.org
antoine@apache.org

corrected patch file, no System.out.println any more
